SniffLiterals(String, TokenTable, ref BitArray)

Finds, converts, and returns all literals found in the provided JavaScript source code.

Declaration
public static Token[] SniffLiterals(string source, TokenTable token_table, ref BitArray reserved)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.String source

The source code to extract literals from.
TokenTable token_table

The TokenTable to use as reference for the creation of a returned Token
System.Collections.BitArray reserved

The System.Collections.BitArray to set true for every index that the extracted literals occupy within source.
Returns
Type Description
Token[]

Every extracted literal Token found in source.
